snp5.13:1105: "Jhāyiṁ virajamāsīnaṁ,Katakiccaṁ anāsavaṁ;Pāraguṁ sabbadhammānaṁ,Atthi pañhena āgamaṁ;Aññāvimokkhaṁ pabrūhi,Avijjāya pabhedanaṁ".
snp5.13:1108: "Kiṁsu saṁyojano loko,kiṁsu tassa vicāraṇaṁ;Kissassa vippahānena,nibbānaṁ iti vuccati".
snp5.13:1110: "Kathaṁ satassa carato,viññāṇaṁ uparujjhati;Bhagavantaṁ puṭṭhumāgamma,taṁ suṇoma vaco tava".
snp5.13:1111: "Ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca,Vedanaṁ nābhinandato;Evaṁ satassa carato,Viññāṇaṁ uparujjhatī"ti.
